content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price is €1,200 per month. I am sure you will find the location of the apartment to be quite convenient. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not expect any favorable conditions in the lease term or utilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. The rental price of €1,200 per month is quite high, considering it's an unfurnished apartment. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Yes, Max Müller, there is always room for negotiation. However, my goal is to get the highest price possible. I am willing to negotiate, but the final price will still be high. It's a great location, and I am sure you will appreciate the convenience of its central location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Schmidt. Could we perhaps meet in the middle? €1,200 is quite steep, but I understand the value of the location. How about €1,000 per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, meeting in the middle would be €1,100 per month. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Remember, the location of the apartment is in the city center, and it is close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. The location is indeed a key selling point. Would you be willing to accept €1,050 per month? This is a fair compromise for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, €1,050 per month is still lower than what I am looking for. I appreciate your attempt to reach a compromise, but I must insist on a higher price. The location of the apartment is in the city center, and it is close to all important facilities. I am sure you will appreciate the convenience of its central location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. The location is a significant advantage. How about €1,100 per month? This would be a fair reflection of the value of the location.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, €1,100 per month is closer to what I am looking for. However, I believe the value of the location justifies a higher price. I am sure you will appreciate the convenience of its central location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I do appreciate the central location, Mister Schmidt. Could we perhaps split the difference again and agree on €1,075 per month? This would be a reasonable price considering the amenities and location.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, €1,075 per month is still lower than what I am looking for. However, I appreciate your persistence in negotiation. As I mentioned before, the location of the apartment is in the city center, and it is close to all important facilities. I am sure you will appreciate the convenience of its central location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
